summary: Conversion of an Oblivion mod made by NIHS. It will not replace anything and has the same stats as Daedric Greatsword
descriptionHtml:
Originally an Oblivion mod by NIHS located here: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/23895 All credit goes to the original author. The sword is from the game Monster Hunter.

I converted it to Skyrim myself following this guide: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2158
It\'s stand-alone so it won\'t replace anything. Stats, crafting, and upgrading are all the same as the Daedric Greatsword. It\'s enchantable and the blood splatter works like it should. This is my first upload so I just hope I packed the files right so it works with Mod Manager. If you have any problems, questions, or suggestions feel free to ask.

NIHS stated on the original mod\'s page that it was free to modify and distribute so I\'ll go ahead and state the same here. Do what you want with it. Texture, Stat, Animation mods. Have at it. Just remember to give credit to the original author, NIHS.
author: NIHS
